definition: word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: Usually songs that are good to dance have terrible words.
sentences.chinese: 通常来说，可以用来伴舞的歌曲歌词都很差劲。

sentences.english: She said that memorizing the words of English songs helped a little.
sentences.chinese: 她说记风行歌曲歌词也有点帮忙。

sentences.english: 'Nowhere Man' came, words and music, the whole damn thing.
sentences.chinese: 方外之人来啦，歌词和音乐，所有他妈的一切。

sentences.english: Try making up the words to one of your favorite songs, and sing it out loud.
sentences.chinese: 记住你最喜欢的歌的歌词，并大声的唱出来。

sentences.english: Let us try to sing this song together so that the audience will be able to hear the words.
sentences.chinese: 让我们一起唱这支歌，好让听众能听清楚歌词。

sentences.english: In fact, the unfamiliarity of the language is the just attraction for the appreciation of the words of songs.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，正是语言陌生化使歌词文本给人以审美享受。

sentences.english: This is what I have just written to the Radio song lyrics .
sentences.chinese: 这是我刚给电台台歌写的歌词。

sentences.english: London Bridge is falling down, Falling down, Falling down.
sentences.chinese: 《伦敦铁桥垮下来》有相当大的变化的歌词的押韵。

sentences.english: And these lyrics and melodies never go out of style.
sentences.chinese: 而且这些歌词和旋律永远不会过时。

sentences.english: Read Ava Maria rose from the words for free.
sentences.chinese: 阅读阿瓦玛丽亚从歌词的玫瑰免费。

sentences.english: I only edited the lyric of song once.
sentences.chinese: 我只是将这首歌的歌词编辑整理了一遍。

sentences.english: Never knowing what a couple more bucks in his pocket might mean.
sentences.chinese: 我把歌词写在下面，有知道的顶一下。

sentences.english: Go to read free of "the" words Royal Jesters.
sentences.chinese: 我们一起去阅读免费从皇家杰斯特斯歌词。

sentences.english: Some librettos, for example, are still very popular today.
sentences.chinese: 有些歌词直到今天依然很流行。

sentences.english: And will continue to honor the words of my heart before the implementation of a new discovery.
sentences.chinese: 这些我的心将继续歌词是由新发现的荣誉演出。

sentences.english: And the lyrics of some rock songs are very thoughtful.
sentences.chinese: 而且一些摇滚歌曲的歌词非常有思想。

definition: sung performance/to sing for an audience
to flow right off the tongue (of lyrics or poetry)/to recite with ease/catchy (of a song)
to rhyme/sometimes written 壓韻|压韵
